column4: I installed Adobe Flash Player. YouTube (with firefox) still doesn't want to accept that its been installed. Solution?
I installed Adobe Flash Player. YouTube (with firefox) still doesn't want to accept that its been installed. Solution?
downloaded the .tar.gz, extracted and ran the install file as a terminal app as my admin user
if you got FF (or a gecko based browser) -- you coulda gotten the .deb; unless you didn't want to do that?
the package manager doesn't seem to like the .deb
